name: Form Fitting
description:
Form Fitting is a casual puzzle game where players must pick up different shaped blocks and drag them into the corresponding empty slots. Victory is achieved when all the slots are filled. The game features hundreds of thoughtfully designed levels, each with a unique challenge. Players must use limited space to think strategically and complete all levels.

Game Features:

Simple and fun gameplay
Hundreds of thoughtfully designed levels
Each level presents a unique challenge
A variety of different shaped blocks to use
Difficulty gradually increases for a more challenging experience
